src_original: tasmāt tadā prajñā bhāvayitavyā /  yadā samapravṛtte dve api bhavato yuganaddhavāhibalīvardadvayavat tadānabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tāvat sthātavyaṃ yāvat kāyacittapīḍā na bhavet /  saṃkṣepataḥ sarvasyaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti /  kausīdyam, ālambanasaṃpramoṣaḥ,  layaḥ,
tgt_original: ṣaddoṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇāṣṭābhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskāraiḥ samanvāgatena samādhinā prajñāpāramitāṃ manasi kurvan pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchaivaṃ śroṣyasītyavavādo dattaḥ syāt |

src_original: upekṣā ceti /  tatrādyāścatvāraḥ kausīdyapratipakṣāḥ /  tathā hi- samādhiguṇeṣvabhisaṃpratyayalakṣaṇayā śraddhayā yogino 'bhilāṣaḥ samutpadyate /  tato 'bhilāṣavān vīryamārabhate /  tato vīryārambhaṇāt kāyacittayoḥ karmaṇyatāṃ bhāvayati /  tataḥ prasrabdhakāyacetasaḥ (Bhk 230)
tgt_original: tato bīryabalena kāyacittaprasrabdhimāsādayati |  tataḥ prasrabdhakāyacetasaḥ kausīdyaṃ vyāvartate |

src_original: kausīdyaṃ vyāvartate /  tataḥ [śraddhādayaḥ kausīdyaprahāṇāya bhavanti] tadartha te bhāvanīyāḥ /
layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tu anābhogadoṣaḥ tatastatpratipakṣeṇa cetanā bhāvanīyā /  layauddhatyapraśame sati,
tgt_original: bhyasanīyā |  layauddhatyapraśame sati yadā cittamālambane niṣprakampamanabhisaṃskāravāhi pravṛttaṃ bhavati,

src_original: tathā hi- samādherguṇeṣvabhisampratyayalakṣaṇayā śraddhayā tatra yogino 'bhilāṣa utpadyate /
tgt_original: tathāhi samādhiguṇeṣṭhabhisampratyayalakṣaṇayā yogina śraddhayā chandaḥ samutpadyate |

src_original: tadvīryabalena kāyacittakarmaṇyatām (Bhk 184) āsādayati /  tataḥ praśrabdhakāyacetasaḥ kausīdyam āvartate /
tgt_original: tato bīryabalena kāyacittaprasrabdhimāsādayati |  tataḥ prasrabdhakāyacetasaḥ kausīdyaṃ vyāvartate |
